SAINT.Name: Martyr Myron the Presbyter of Cyzicus (+250)
Venerable Alypy, the Iconographer of the Kievan Caves, near caves (+ c.1114)
Martyrs Straton, Philip, Eutychian and Cyprian, of Nicomedia (+c.303)
Martyrs Thyrsus, Leucius, Coronatus and their companions at Caesarea in Bithynia (+c.249-251)
Martyrs Paul, his sister Juliana and others in Syria (+c.273)
